title: Git Management
content:
# Git Management

2022-07-03 18:44

Mini Program IDE supports use of visualized Git management tool to manage the project codes.

![Git Management](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/5063e8b4-4bff-4e44-87be-5cae926141e1.png#align=left&display=inline&height=1386&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=1386&originWidth=592&status=done&style=stroke&width=592)

## 1\. Initialize Git

When the project directory has no Git warehouse, you can directly initialize Git ( `git init`).

![Git Management](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/6aefd039-db0b-4190-b4bf-7eb114278413.png#align=left&display=inline&height=678&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=678&originWidth=592&status=done&style=stroke&width=592)

## 2\. Stage Change

You can choose to stage all changes by using one-key ( `git add .`), or hover over individual file and choose to stage.

![Git Management](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/76482b46-8b4b-40af-a63f-31e77f236a90.png#align=left&display=inline&height=724&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=724&originWidth=592&status=done&style=stroke&width=592)

## 3\. Submit Change

Submit the staged change locally ( `git commit -m 'xxx'`)

![Git Management](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/2e35a6ab-924c-4d13-a89b-492aea034013.png#align=left&display=inline&height=448&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=448&originWidth=480&status=done&style=stroke&width=480)

Confirm the code diff and then do the submission operation.

![Git Management](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/7d50d35d-b753-4a80-bcca-933c9f71d7f2.png#align=left&display=inline&height=1064&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=1064&originWidth=1848&status=done&style=stroke&width=1848)

## 4\. Push to Remote Warehouse

Add to the warehouse ( `git remote add origin xxxxxx`)

![Git Management](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/66bd32ee-c76d-4a5a-b5b3-018f96691b90.png#align=left&display=inline&height=422&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=422&originWidth=462&status=done&style=stroke&width=462)

Confirm and push ( `git push origin`)

![Git Management](https://gw.alipayobjects.com/mdn/rms_150082/afts/img/A*S46zTJ_z_bMAAAAAAAAAAABkARQnAQ#align=left&display=inline&height=418&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=418&originWidth=1190&status=done&style=stroke&width=1190)
